lead_paragraph: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi was unhurt in the blast, which hit a checkpoint nearby. But it underscored the government’s tenuous hold on security.

byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Cairo, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: Bomb Kills at Least 8 Near President’s Palace
headline.main: Bomb Kills 8 in Yemen Near President’s Residence

snippet: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi was unhurt in the blast, which hit a checkpoint nearby. But it underscored the government’s tenuous hold on security.
abstract: Islamic State militants say they are responsible for suicide bombing attack on convoy of Yemen officials near Aden presidential palace; security reports Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi was not hurt in explosion, but at least eight others died from blast.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
